author: remm
msg: - in MacroImpl.deleteObject(), ignore the ObjectHasChildrenException if
thrown, as those children exist because something has failed deeper in
the recursion (for example a child might have been locked).
thus a corresponding exception has already been added to the
Patch submitted by Christopher Lenz <cmlenz at gmx.de>.

author: remm
msg: - Tentative fix for this problem when using the JDBC content store :
java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified
Bug reported by Rajkumar Kothapa <kothapa at intalio.com> (as well as others before)
Patch submitted by Valeriy Podkolzin <vpodkolzin at atg.com>
